content:
Update the appearance of your FlexCard elements with the Appearance properties in the Style panel of the FlexCard Designer. Change the text color, background, border, and set a Salesforce theme for your elements.

Appearance properties are configurable in the Style panel of the FlexCard Designer when you select an element. Update background, text color, border, and theme of your elements.

Style FlexCard Elements
title: Customizing FlexCards Element Appearance
